title: Zong joins hands with SRCC to foster cultural exchange along Silk Road
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 11 (APP): Zong 4G, Pakistan’s leading digital and telecommunications services on Wednesday announced its role as the exclusive partner for the launch of the Silk Road Culture Center (SRCC).
This partnership emphasizes Zong’s steadfast commitment to fostering cultural exchange and innovation across the region said a news release.
The inauguration of the SRCC was attended by ambassadors and diplomats from Silk Road nations, with the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China among the key attendees.
The event celebrated the historical legacy of the Silk Road as a symbol of trade, innovation, and cultural collaboration, emphasizing its relevance in today’s interconnected world.
The Executive Director of Strategy for Zong,  Naveed Akhtar, attended the event as its Chief Guest. Speaking at the event, he highlighted the shared heritage of Pakistan and Silk Road countries, saying, “The Silk Road symbolizes connection, exchange, and understanding, showcasing how cultures unite to create something greater.
This center bridges traditions celebrates shared values, and strengthens ties. Zong proudly supports this initiative, believing progress comes from both innovation and cultural integration, fostering a brighter future for all.”
“Pakistan’s historic connection with Silk Road countries reminds us of the power of collaboration and exchange. The SRCC is a significant step forward in enhancing connections across borders, and we are honoured to contribute to this initiative,” stated the official spokesperson for Zong 4G.
As a subsidiary of China Mobile, Zong reaffirmed its dedication to strengthening bilateral and regional ties with China. This partnership highlights the synergy between the two entities in driving projects that promote connectivity and shared progress.
Zong’s involvement with the SRCC represents its broader commitment to supporting initiatives that bridge cultures and inspire collaboration. The company envisions the SRCC as a catalyst for cultural and economic growth in the region, building a future rooted in mutual respect and shared prosperity.
By combining the technological expertise of Zong 4G with the SRCC’s mission of cultural exchange, this collaboration sets a precedent for innovation and integration. Together, Zong and its partners aim to write a new chapter in the legacy of the Silk Road, where cultural heritage and modern progress go hand in hand.
